translations: adj.陷入的；被缠住的；使卷入的
v.使陷入；缠住（enmesh 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: All too often they become enmeshed in deadening routines.
sentences.translation: 他们时常陷入枯燥的日常事务中。

sentences.sentence: For many hundreds of thousands of people worldwide, online networking has become enmeshed in our daily lives.
sentences.translation: 对于世界各地成千上万的人来说，在线社交已经融入了我们的日常生活。

sentences.sentence: One thing is our dualism is enmeshed in our language.
sentences.translation: 首先,二元论镶嵌于我们的语言之中
